metaData.title: Cycling trails in Rosia Montana
metaData.description: MTB trails on unpaved roads along mountain peaks, lakes, villages or unused mining areas. Asphalted trails for touring bikes towards touristic sights. Rent bikes or guided tours on bikes to find out more about  Rosia Montana, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania, Romania.

specificArticles.textContent: Test your bike brakes, inflate the tires and bring it to Roșia Montană, or you can rent one from us. The MTB trails will take you on country roads, around the village and surrounding villages towards various attractions. The paved trails - for touring bikes, motorcycles or cars - are mapped on national roads, towards the attractions from our area. The maps of the trails are made in google maps, so you can zoom in, see them in satellite mode or access them on any smartphone or tablet. Under each trail you'll find indications estimated by us (round trip distance, duration). The indications within the map are provided by google. When you don’t ride your bike, you can keep it safe in our garage.
